game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time has lost all meaning, players take on the role of the last Chronokeeper, tasked with restoring the fabric of time. The once-great civilization of Aethoria has been ravaged by a cataclysmic event known as 'The Great Dissonance', causing temporal echoes to ripple throughout the land.
game.beginning: Players begin in the ruined city of Elyria, where they awaken from a deep slumber with no memory of who they are or why they're there. As they explore the abandoned streets, they stumble upon ancient artifacts and cryptic messages that hint at their connection to the Chronokeeper's order.
game.ending: The journey takes players through diverse landscapes and environments, each with its own unique time-manipulation mechanics. By solving puzzles and battling against rogue Time Reavers, the player must unravel the mystery behind The Great Dissonance and find a way to repair the timestream. Ultimately, they must face their own destiny and make a choice that will determine the course of Aethoria's future.
